Title: Enacts the "RIDE (responsibility in delivery enforcement) act"
Summary: Enacts the "RIDE (responsibility in delivery enforcement) act", relating to responsibility for civil penalties or traffic fines incurred by employees while operating a bicycle with electric assist in the course of such employees' job duties.
LawCode: Add ยง1244, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to enacting the RIDE (responsibility in delivery enforcement) act
